content: I so love this, Tre! If I had a girl, I would do the same exact thing. Not the details because I don’t have the brothers for the uncles, but I’d shower her with unlimited love and expose her to all great writers, artists and musicians. I’d encourage her to find out who she is in the depths of her spirit and no matter who that is I would support her and respect her. Ah, if I had a girl…
